overview:
Andrew founded Webb Technologies in 1998 and since then has been the companys Chief Executive Officer. In 2001, Andrew created Collaborative Workspaces, the enterprise collaboration software suite from which Sosius was born. Andrew is responsible for overseeing the daily operations of the company as well as product and business development.

Following a first class degree in computer science Andrew worked on accounting systems for British Airports Authority and Commercial Aviation Authority then went on to work for City Networks, designing and developing the TRAM trading confirmation system for major international banks, now used by 95% of the worlds banks.
